name: Flying Asteroids
description:
Flying asteroids is a space action game where you are a spaceship dodging asteroids. You can change the look of your spaceship, check your stats, play on different modes, and more. Play with a friend through local multiplayer or play solo.

Flying asteroids is heavily inspired by the original Asteroids but with modified game mechanics. You can play with your keyboard or a gamepad of your choice.

NOTE: I personally don't own a computer with either linux or macOS installed so I don't know how well it works on those operating systems
